com.petgame.ui

Class Furfrou

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petgame.ui.Pet
      • com.petgame.ui.Furfrou

  • public class Furfrou
extends Pet
    The Furfrou class represents the Furfrou pet in the game. This class extends the Pet class and initializes the Furfrou pet with specific attributes. It also handles stat decreases through background threads.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Furfrou

        public Furfrou(java.lang.String name,
               GameManager gm)
        Constructs a new Furfrou instance with the given name and GameManager instance. Initializes the pet's attributes and starts background threads for stats.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the pet.
        gm - The GameManager instance managing the game flow.

               GameManager gm)
        Constructs a new Furfrou instance with detailed attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the pet.
        points - The points scored by the pet.
        healthCur - The current health of the pet.
        healthMax - The maximum health of the pet.
        fullnessCur - The current fullness level of the pet.
        fullnessMax - The maximum fullness level of the pet.
        sleepCur - The current sleep level of the pet.
        state - The current state of the pet.
        sleepMax - The maximum sleep level of the pet.
        happinessCur - The current happiness level of the pet.
        happinessMax - The maximum happiness level of the pet.
        lastVet - The timestamp of the last vet visit.
        lastExercise - The timestamp of the last exercise.
        lastPlay - The timestamp of the last play session.
        gm - The GameManager instance managing the game flow.
